content:
$f$ is a continuous piecewise linear function defined as follows:

$\qquad f(x) = \begin{cases}
2.25x+19.5 & , &  -10\leq x<-6 \\\\
-0.5x+3 & , & -6\leq x<2\\\\
-{\dfrac{10}{3}}x+{\dfrac{26}{3}} & , & 2\leq x<5\\\\
2.4x-20 & , & 5\leq x\leq 10\end{cases}$

**Drag the ends of the segments below to graph $f$.**

[[â˜ƒ interactive-graph 1]]
